AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Raymond McMillon: individual being questioned by Agent Pena, passenger in the tractor-trailer, attempted to pull down the fold-up bed, charged with conspiracy to transport aliens within the United States, filed a motion to dismiss the indictment on speedy trial grounds, sentenced to 41 months' imprisonment, argues about the lawfulness of Agent Pena's immigration questions
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Luis Pena: Government agent who questioned Williams and McMillon, asked for consent to search the tractor's sleeper area, testified at the jury trial, asked immigration questions
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Raymond McMillon and Zeba Williams: pair being questioned by Agent Pena about their travel plans and citizenship
